message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product is worth a bit more than $120. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I understand your perspective, but I believe $120 is a fair price for the product considering my budget constraints. I hope we can reach an agreement closer to my proposed price.
